java/liquibase/util/ObjectUtil.java

00001 package liquibase.util;
00002 
00003 import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
00004 import java.lang.reflect.Method;
00005 
00006 public class ObjectUtil {
00007     
00008     public static void setProperty(Object object, String propertyName, String propertyValue) throws IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException {
00009         String methodName = "set" + propertyName.substring(0, 1).toUpperCase() + propertyName.substring(1);
00010         Method[] methods = object.getClass().getMethods();
00011         for (Method method : methods) {
00012             if (method.getName().equals(methodName)) {
00013                 if (method.getParameterTypes().length == 1 && method.getParameterTypes()[0].equals(Boolean.class)) {
00014                     method.invoke(object, Boolean.valueOf(propertyValue));
00015                     return;
00016                 } else
00017                 if (method.getParameterTypes().length == 1 && method.getParameterTypes()[0].equals(String.class)) {
00018                     method.invoke(object, propertyValue);
00019                     return;
00020                 } else
00021                 if (method.getParameterTypes().length == 1 && method.getParameterTypes()[0].equals(Integer.class)) {
00022                     method.invoke(object, Integer.valueOf(propertyValue));
00023                     return;
00024                 }
00025             }
00026         }
00027         throw new RuntimeException("Property not found: " + propertyName);
00028     }
00029 }
